response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to maximize your investment while securing a competitive advantage in your market. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
